thread.title: Police: Man driving stolen truck killed after LI crash
thread.title_full: Police: Man driving stolen truck killed after LI crash - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Police: Man driving stolen truck killed after LI crash
text:
ROOSEVELT, N.Y. (AP) - State police say a man driving a stolen box truck that crashed on a Long Island parkway was killed after being struck by several vehicles.
The accident happened at about 1:45 a.m. Thursday on the Southern State Parkway. Police had received reports of a truck driving erratically in the eastbound lanes when it struck the center guard rail in Roosevelt.
One of the men in the truck, later identified as 28-year-old Rick Munoz of Oyster Bay, was struck and killed in the roadway.
A second man, identified as 27-year-old Joel Padilla, was arrested on a charge of possession of stolen property. It was not immediately clear if Padilla had an attorney who could comment.
Police say the box truck had been stolen from New York City.
